Package chess23

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
chess23.Piece
chess23.Pawn
public class Pawn
extends chess23.Piece
Class representing a pawn in chess.

    • canEatLeftDig

      private boolean canEatLeftDig​(chess23.Pieces pieces)
      Determines whether the pawn can eat diagonally to the left.
      Parameters:
      pieces - the Pieces used for playing.
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate at the top, left diagonal is occupied by a Piece of the opposite colour to the Pawn moving.

    • canEatRightDig

      private boolean canEatRightDig​(chess23.Pieces pieces)
      Determines whether the pawn can eat diagonally to the right.
      Parameters:
      pieces - the Pieces used for playing.
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate at the top, right diagonal is occupied by a Piece of the opposite colour to the Pawn moving.

    • pawnForward

      private java.util.ArrayList<chess23.Coordinate> pawnForward​(chess23.Pieces pieces)
      Determines how many squares a Pawn can move forward.
      Parameters:
      pieces - the Pieces used for playing.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList, containing the Coordinate squares to which the pawn can move. The number of squares is:
      • 0 if there is a piece in front of the pawn,
      • 1 if the square in front of the pawn is free,
      • 2 if the pawn is in its initial position, and both squares in front of it are empty.

    • enPassant

      public java.util.ArrayList<chess23.Coordinate> enPassant​(chess23.Pieces pieces)
      Determines how many squares a Pawn can capture en passant. It also sets the value of enPassantLeft and enPassantRight.
      Parameters:
      pieces - the Pieces used for playing.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the Coordinate that a Pawn can move to in order to capture en passant. These are added if:
      • the Piece directly to the left/right contains a Pawn of the opposite colour,
      • this Pawn has just moved 2 squares forward from its initial position

    • cliPromotionQuery

      public void cliPromotionQuery​(chess23.Coordinate promotionSquare)
      Used to determine the piece to which to promote a Pawn in a CliBoard. Sets the value of promotedPiece.
      Parameters:
      promotionSquare - the square to which the Pawn moves to when getting promoted.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if a Piece is not correctly instantiated.

    • guiPromotionQuery

      public void guiPromotionQuery​(chess23.Coordinate promotionSquare)
      Used to determine the piece to which to promote a Pawn in a GuiBoard. Sets the value of promotedPiece. If no piece is chosen, a Queen is chosen as default.
      Parameters:
      promotionSquare - the Coordinate square to which the Pawn moves to when getting promoted.

    • canPromote

      public boolean canPromote​(chess23.Coordinate coordinate)
      Determines if a black Pawn can promote.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the Coordinate square to which the Pawn moves to when getting promoted.
      Returns:
      true if the Pawn is would be promoted if it reached the coordinate.
      For a black Pawn, the rank of the coordinate is 1.
      For a white Pawn, the rank of the coordinate is 8.

    • getPromotedPiece

      public chess23.Piece getPromotedPiece()
